documents.document: @miguelmyriad Men-straay-shun, whaaaa'?? Where's the "u"?
@thecitizenaor @PizzaExpress Now I want dough balls!
@thecitizenaor @PizzaExpress This exchange has been both enjoyable and informative.
@FancyHam89 Yeah, short eps too. Just did 5 in a row. Barrymore &Olyphant are so charming and beautiful. And it's funnier than I'd expected.
Unsurprisingly, Timothy Olyphant is ageing like a fucking boss.
I feel Blade Runner and Dune reboots are in safe hands with Villeneuve but don't want him becoming the reboot guy. https://t.co/JDrk3FDp3L
These streets are full of ghosts... #Smithfield https://t.co/eAbSO58Xp3
@Darren_Mooney That's how I did it
@Darren_Mooney Oh yeah, that's a problem. Less bingeable! :)
@Darren_Mooney Crazy ExGirlfriend! But I feel you need to give it a few eps to settle into itself. It's richer than it looks at first.
Revisiting The People Vs Larry Flynt. Edward Norton's speech on freedom/cebsorship packs a significant punch today. https://t.co/NBAGeUsDTW
**DREAM Saturday night crew https://t.co/iOQ3Lk815l
A class act, always. #RIPJohnHurt https://t.co/Bp4vbOyFyr
@AntonyRoland Yeah it's kind of intense. I was populating some very dull spreadsheets at the time so was grateful for the drama :)
@AntonyRoland I listened to it twice today. It's remarkably effective in the film but as a record, it works beautifully also.
If Mica Levi doesn't get her Oscar for the Jackie soundtrack it's all a cod! Unreal. https://t.co/KgfXTofWsr
Ahhh feck! #SingStreet really deserved a Best Song nomination. Yay for #ConsolataBoyle though!
@ronandusty Ah, he was such a find. Super performance in a really tough role!
@TheShiftyShadow Aw we can't hold that against her forever.
I won't be happy unless #AmyAdams gets TWO #OscarNoms
A great trailer for Colossal, one my faves from the Vanguard section in TIFF last year. https://t.co/9MEittFVIa
@TonyMcKiver @LightHouseD7 Thanks to YOU for hounding me for Jesse James. One of my greatest accomplishments :)
Five years of trying to achieve maximum fun in @LightHouseD7. Think this karaoke dance-fest photo represents accur… https://t.co/L8vVoVllfP
@ach0 That's all I can imagine now! :)
@lukemcmanus @Dream_Dare_Do I know! It would have been really cool to experience in a cinema.
Wait a minute, Greg from Crazy Ex Girlfriend is this guy?!? Mad, had no idea. https://t.co/hg7j3XMtLU
@Dream_Dare_Do We tried to make it happen but it didn't work out :(
@DublinFilmFest There's a lotta circles! :)
@FancyHam89 It's a tough job but someone's gotta do it or there'd be no festival! ;)
At home by the fire drawing circles around everything I wanna see at #ADIFF17. Exciting!! https://t.co/8XBIgextQP
The songs in Crazy Ex Girlfriend have really improved this season. And the staging. Everything. Really enjoying it.
#LALALAND for the third time is still a delight. If anyone needs someone to bring them to see it I volunteer.
@Immikesheridan This and A Fish Called Wanda are tied for me in the "Greatest Comedy Ever" stakes.
@JayCoyle Jay, are you trying to rip off the #LiveByNight poster??? https://t.co/x7zzuuvbL3
@JayCoyle I saw it at the Fleadh with a VERY responsive audience, which was a delight. Those lead actors are outrageously talented!
@sazzybm I really liked the film. So many good films out in the next few weeks!
@sazzybm @CinemaBookClub I think I can 100% say that next month is Postcards from the Edge. The rest is sooooo close to being confirmed.
@JayCoyle One of the most genuinely hilarious films I saw last year. I hardly stopped laughing for the whole film. Belly laughs.
@sazzybm I have indeed. One of my faves.
Lots of watching and reading to do after the #IFB2017 launch. Exciting stuff in there. https://t.co/PEAItRXlMw
@JVickyOwens Berlin is always fun!
@JVickyOwens I'm not going to Berlin. I just went last year on holidays. You'll have to go alone I'm afraid.
This day last year we all awoke to the shocking news of David Bowie's death. Hard to believe a year has passed. I still miss him.
Not to mention revolting hats. https://t.co/vFfAX4Y9Dy
@mashob Except this. It's The One That Got Away. And Fantastic Beasts.
@davidk30 @davidk30 Of course I'm thinking it. Need to know who has it over here though. Let's get on the case.
@mashob I am dyyyyyyying to see it!
@mashob @dublinbowiefest @singalongsocial I shall sing with you tomorrow so - through my Manchester By The Sea tears!
@mashob @dublinbowiefest @singalongsocial I missed it too so we'll plan one for just ourselves when you're feeling better.
Yep, Donald Glover is the greatest. Look at that suit! Yes. https://t.co/air8pN8lUo
John Hughes really knew how to kick off a movie! Happy Birthday #DavidBowie. #TheBreakfastClub #Changes… https://t.co/Db5L77foAM
A fine evening in the newly refurbished @barbersd7 in #Grangegorman. Always happy to find a new local.
Really hope to get down to @LightHouseD7 this weekend to finally see #TheManWhoFellToEarth on the big screen as par… https://t.co/04VW52Vc1T
@mashob we discussed it but decided to stick to scores.
yhis #SingStreet soundtrack #vinyl is so spot-on. I love it! https://t.co/AWQVDFqZmN
That was an emotional chat! #EndaWalsh discussing the creative process behind #Lazarus. Fascinating. https://t.co/6pcHqIwi0z
First event of #DubBowieFest - An Evening With Enda Walsh. Excited for this. https://t.co/wIf99nbhP5
@emerosheaa Neither of us drive. Seems a tricky place to not drive but day trip by train is certainly doable.
@JamiePaisley89 Sostrene Green...all the pretty things!
@mrhig Right, I'll investigate that further then. Thanks! Fingers crossed for less fires when we go there! :)
@mrhig Thanks! Great list. I was under the impression that The Magic Castle is a members or invite-only place?
@mashob Oh! Well that goes without saying.
@mickmahon13 Oh I do indeed. Sounds great. Thanks!
@MarkDByrne Oh that sounds interesting!
@mickmahon13 Oh I'd heard of that. Definitely on the list. Good one!
@ronandusty Here's hoping.
@ronandusty I have a feeling I will be in a constant state of "beside myself".
@ronandusty I've never been to any of the Disneylands!
@sarahfran Great shout, thanks!
Honeymoon in L.A. Any tips for lovely things to do and see that I may not have stumbled upon in my years of dreaming about this trip?
Jaysus there's David Cross and Jay Mohr! Haven't seen this film in yeeeears #smallsoldiers
@DonaldClarke63 I couldn't sleep for a week after that terrifying Acid Queen sequence. Kudos to Tina for that horri… https://t.co/VUpuP5Qogb
Can't actually believe that's Edward Herrmann as FDR in #Annie. https://t.co/HS8YyCLHM0
"I told you Cha Cha Heels!!". Have a John Waters Christmas everybody. https://t.co/Ubc8I6ko1l
Merry Christmas friends! https://t.co/8EC4rAoP1k
@LightHouseD7 Merry Christmas you old movie house! https://t.co/ihLQQIfbrl
@mashob @r_smalls I'm better with Christmas carols...jussayin'
@lennyabrahamson It's a pretty seriously big deal. And oh my god how great is Jacob? Little legend.
@mashob @r_smalls I don't ever know words to things. My lyric retention os dreadful! You'll have to write them down for me.
@mashob @r_smalls "Hurry boy, it's waiting there for yoooooou..."
@lennyabrahamson You know you've made it when you're being name-dropped on Billy On The Street. https://t.co/44ZJDYJ9vx
@LightHouseD7 Ooh, The Witch and Little Men! And Train To Busan.
@LightHouseD7 So many, GreenRoom,SwissArmyMan,MadMary, Room, NeonDemon,NocturnalAnimals,OneMoreTimeWithFeeling,CaptFantastic,Wilderpeople...
Wish @BretEastonEllis would release a compilation of those wonderfully random songs from his podcast. It'd be a delightful Christmas gift.
@JayCoyle @BrianMLloyd There usually a couple per episode that makes me giggle. Some shows more so than others.
@BrianMLloyd @JayCoyle Casey Affleck is NOT a comedian though.Talented guy but not a comedian.
@MarkDByrne I did think he was a bit of a Sully try-hard alright. Still charming though
@petes_sake And Redford was great!
@petes_sake Exactly! It felt very comfortable. Like a warm hug.
Finally saw Pete's Dragon. I thought it was super sweet. I enjoyed how simple it was and looked beautiful. And I cried.
S2 of #TheAffair is so ambitious in the scope of it's writing. Really enjoying it.
@mickmahon13 That's ok then ;)
@stevefanagan Thanks, that's really nice of you to say. Appreciated!
The joy! https://t.co/K55ZFaO2Y9
Me too. I remember a time when Irish audiences weren't quite so receptive. So great to see such support at home and… https://t.co/vLGtKMxAvN
@mickmahon13 Should I fear for some kind of All About Eve scenario?
@calipotheatre There's certainly cause to raise a few Carlsbergs this evening ;)
@calipotheatre So lovely to see Mad Mary in yet another end of year list :)
Really pleased that @LightHouseD7's three biggest films of 2016 were #IrishFilms. It's been a good year! https://t.co/8z9tlEFlrb
@IrishTimesCultr @colliethorn @SeanaKerslake Great choice! :)
